string.value: What does it mean to be a Pirate? Talk to #p1002101# in Lith Harbor.

#p1002101# in Lith Harbor says you can choose to become a #bPirate#k once you reach #bLevel 10#k. He tells you to see #r#p1090000##k in #rThe Nautilus#k. If you'd like to walk there, check your World Map. (#rW#k)
You learned what it takes to be a true Pirate from #p1090000#. You have a feeling this is the right path for you.
오~ 해적이 되고 싶단건가? 마음의 준비는 단단히 했겠지?
좋아. #r해적#k은 #b힘(Str)#k과 민첩(Dex)함이 필요한 직업이라고 알고 있어. 해적이 되고 싶다면 #r노틸러스호#k의 #b#p1090000##k님을 만나러 가봐.
해적이 되고 싶었던 거 아니었나? 뭐..어떤 직업이든 마음의 준비가 된다면 다시 나를 찾아와.
Oh, so you want to become a Pirate? Are you ready for it?
Okay, being a #rPirate#k requires a delicate balance of #bStrength and Dexterity#k. If you want to become one, you may want to see #b#p1090000##k at #rThe Nautilus#k.
Passing by me and go further, you can find #bPirate Statue#k to teleport to #bNautilus#k.
You're not here to become a Pirate? Well... whatever it is, if you feel like you're ready, let me know.
Did you come all the way here to become a Pirate?
Not everyone can become a Pirate. In order to become one, you must be at least at Level 10.
#b#p1090000##k has recently parked her ship The Nautilus in between Henesys and Ellinia, and is staying there.
